files.tests/test_gui.py:
import pytest
from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright
import subprocess
import time

def test_app_launches():
    # Start the application
    process = subprocess.Popen(['python', 'src/main.py'])
    time.sleep(3)  # Wait for app to start
    
    with sync_playwright() as p:
        browser = p.chromium.launch()
        page = browser.new_page()
        page.goto('http://localhost:5000')
        
        # Check title
        assert '${PROJECT_NAME}' in page.title()
        
        # Click button and check message
        page.click('button')
        page.wait_for_selector('#message')
        message = page.text_content('#message')
        assert 'Hello from Python pywebview!' in message
        
        browser.close()
    
    process.terminate()
